TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SendOrPostCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: represents a callback method that you want to execute when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context. Create the delegate by passing your callback method to the constructor. Your method must have the signature shown here.

summary.para: Represents a method to be called when a message is to be dispatched to a synchronization context.
